## ChromHMMviewR

<p align='justify'>R package that draws ggplot2-based heatmaps to visualize data from ChromHMM.</p>

<p align='justify'>ChromHMMviewR has been developed as a practical lesson following the guides in this [this repository](https://github.com/ASPteaching/2017-03-Rpackages_and_Github).</p>

<p align='justify'>The source code and the instructions to install are is available [here](https://github.com/amitjavilaventura/custom-R-functions).</p>
